content.prompt: The poem’s structure is best described as a

choices.label: sequential retelling of the events that occurred during a difficult time in the speaker’s life
series of loosely related flashbacks that build to an expression of the speaker’s current state of mind
stream-of-consciousness account of the thoughts going through the speaker’s mind as she waits at the airport
comparison of the values that the speaker held in her youth with her values as an adult in the present

skill.text: Skill 3.E: Explain the function of a significant event or related set of significant events in a plot.
